SELECT /* SQL_ID : StckDlngMapper.stckDlngSelect(주식 거래 정보 조회) */ * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_ , NO_ , TB.TURN /*순번*/ , TB.BYNGYN /*매수여부*/ , TB.CMPR /*구분*/ , TB.DLNGYMD /*거래일자*/ , TB.TIKER /*주식_티커*/ , TB.STCKCNT /*주식수*/ , TB.USEYN /*사용여부*/ , TB.DELYN /*삭제여부*/ , TB.REGYMD /*등록일자*/ , TB.MDFCNYMD /*수정일자*/ , TB.DVDN /*배당금 */ , TB.DVDNCYC /*배당_주기 */ , TB.STCNM /*주식명*/ , TRIM(CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(TB.DLNGAMT, '^[0-9]+$') THEN TO_CHAR(TB.DLNGAMT , 'L999,999,999') ELSE TO_CHAR(TB.DLNGAMT , 'L999,999,999.999') END) AS DLNGAMT /* 거래금액*/ , totalPages FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_DATE(A.DLNGYMD), B.STCNM) AS ROW_ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.USEYN DESC, A.DELYN, (CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(A.TIKER, '^[0-9]+$') THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), STCNM) AS NO_ , A.TURN /*순번*/ , A.BYNGYN /*매수여부*/ , A.CMPR /*구분*/ , TO_DATE(A.DLNGYMD) AS DLNGYMD /*거래일자*/ , A.TIKER /*주식_티커*/ , A.STCKCNT /*주식수*/ , A.USEYN /*사용여부*/ , A.DELYN /*삭제여부*/ , A.REGYMD /*등록일자*/ , A.MDFCNYMD /*수정일자*/ , B.DVDN /*배당금 */ , B.DVDNCYC /*배당_주기 */ , B.STCNM /*주식명*/ , ((TO_NUMBER(A.STCKCNT) * TO_NUMBER(B.DVDN)) * DECODE(B.DVDNCYC, '월', 12, REGEXP_COUNT(B.DVDNCYC, ',')) ) AS DLNGAMT /* 거래금액 */ ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalPages /*페이징 처리용 총 건수*/ FROM STCKDLNGINFO A, STOCKINFORMATION B WHERE B.TIKER = A.TIKER AND A.USEYN ='Y' AND A.DELYN ='N'
AND A.CMPR = #{S_CMPR} /*구분*/
AND A.BYNGYN = #{S_BYNGYN} /*매수여부*/
AND B.STCNM LIKE '%'|| #{S_STCNM} ||'%' /*주식명*/
AND B.DVDNCYC = #{S_DVDNCYC} /*배당_주기 */
AND A.DLNGYMD BETWEEN REGEXP_REPLACE(#{S_START_YMD}, '[[:punct:]]') AND REGEXP_REPLACE(#{S_END_YMD}, '[[:punct:]]')
AND A.DLNGYMD >= REGEXP_REPLACE(#{S_START_YMD}, '[[:punct:]]')
AND A.DLNGYMD <= REGEXP_REPLACE(#{S_END_YMD}, '[[:punct:]]')
) TB ) WHERE NO_ <= (#{page} * #{rowCount}) ) WHERE (((#{page}-1) * #{rowCount}) + 1) <= NO_
mapper.insert: INSERT /* SQL_ID : StckDlngMapper.stckDlngInsert(주식 거래 정보 등록) */ INTO STCKDLNGINFO ( TURN /*순번*/ , BYNGYN /*매수여부*/ , CMPR /*구분*/ , DLNGYMD /*거래일자*/ , TIKER /*주식_티커*/ , STCKCNT /*주식수*/ , USEYN /*사용여부*/ , DELYN /*삭제여부*/ , REGYMD /*등록일자*/ , MDFCNYMD /*수정일자*/ ) VALUES ( ( SELECT (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(TURN, 7))+1,0),4,0)) FROM STCKDLNGINFO WHERE TURN LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYMMDD') || '%' ) /*순번*/ , #{BYNGYN} /*매수여부*/ , #{CMPR} /*구분*/ , REGEXP_REPLACE(#{DLNGYMD}, '[[:punct:]]') /*거래일자*/ , #{STCNM_SELECT_BOX} /*주식_티커*/ , #{STCKCNT} /*주식수*/ , #{USEYN} /*사용여부*/ , #{DELYN} /*삭제여부*/ , SYSDATE /*등록일자*/ , SYSDATE /*수정일자*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* SQL_ID : StckDlngMapper.stckDlngUpdate(주식 거래 정보 수정) */ STCKDLNGINFO SET BYNGYN = #{BYNGYN} /*매수여부*/ , CMPR = #{CMPR} /*구분*/ , DLNGYMD = #{DLNGYMD} /*거래일자*/ , TIKER = #{TIKER} /*주식_티커*/ , STCKCNT = #{STCKCNT} /*주식수*/ , DLNGAMT = #{DLNGAMT} /*거래금액*/ , USEYN = DECODE(#{DELYN}, 'Y', 'Y', #{USEYN}) /*사용여부*/ , DELYN = #{DELYN} /*삭제여부*/ , MDFCNYMD = SYSDATE /*수정일자*/ WHERE TURN = #{TURN}
mapper.select: SELECT /* SQL_ID : StckDlngMapper.stckInfoInq(주식 정보 조회) */ TURN /*순번 */ ,TIKER /*주식_티커 */ ,STCNM /*주식명 */ ,DVDNCYC /*배당_주기 */ ,DVDN /*배당금 */ ,USEYN /*사용여부 */ ,DELYN /*삭제여부 */ ,REGYMD /*등록일자 */ ,MDFCNYMD /*수정일자 */ FROM STOCKINFORMATION WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY USEYN DESC, DELYN, (CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(TIKER, '^[0-9]+$') THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), STCNM

SELECT /* SQL_ID : StckDlngMapper.getDividendCycleByStockName(주식 정보 조회) */ TURN /*순번 */ ,TIKER /*주식_티커 */ ,STCNM /*주식명 */ ,DVDNCYC /*배당_주기 */ ,DVDN /*배당금 */ FROM STOCKINFORMATION WHERE 1=1 AND TIKER = #{TIKER} AND USEYN = 'Y' AND DELYN = 'N'
